name: orc
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an imaginary creature like a very ugly, violent human, that is described in books by J.R.R. Tolkien: They role-play that they are warriors and wizards who fight orcs and explore worlds.
More examplesFewer examplesThe game is played in the guise of self-created avatars - elfs, wizards, warrior orcs and other Tolkienesque characters.It is a story that involves stark northern landscapes, dragons, orcs and human beings. Hunted by orcs, the hobbits fled.They had to face an orc army.
